# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the choice that’s displayed to the person by the system.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String { get set }
```

## Identifying permissions

- **id**: A unique identifier for this choice.

items.description: A unique identifier for this choice.
items.name: id

title: title
